full_summary:
### Mini Track Loader Procurement

#### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4630240574
* **Publication Date**: June 25, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 17, 2024 (2:00 PM EST)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Solicitation Status**: Expired

#### Description

Parks Canada requires one mini track loader for delivery to the Dalvay Compound in the Prince Edward Island National Park, Canada.

#### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Note**: This solicitation is conditionally limited to Canadian Content.

#### Request for Proposal Details

The full Request for Proposal and attachments can be accessed and downloaded through the SAP Ariba account. If you do not have an SAP Ariba account, please register at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/register](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/register). If you already have an SAP Ariba account, please log in at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/login](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/login).

For technical support with SAP Ariba, please contact the CanadaBuys Service Desk agents at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/contact-support](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/contact-support).

Any amendments to this Request for Proposal will be posted in the Event Messages board in SAP Ariba.

#### Tender Classification

* **UNSPSC Code**: *22101500
* **Classification Description**: Earth Moving Machinery

#### End User

* **End User Entity**: Parks Canada Agency (PC)
* **Address**: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X 0B3, Canada

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Tara Sheppard (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact Note**: Questions specific to the technical requirements of this tender must be sent through the Event Messages board in SAP Ariba.
